definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.english: The emperor of Liang dynasty , Xiao Yan , is famous for revering Buddha in the history of Chinese civilization.
sentences.chinese: 梁武帝蕭衍在中國文化史上是以崇佛的面目出現的。

sentences.english: Moism has a high status and makes remarkable contributions to the development of science and culture in Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 墨家在中國科學文化史上的地位與貢獻是多方面的。

sentences.english: To some extent, school curriculum are the epitome of human culture.
sentences.chinese: 因此從某種程度說，學校課程是人類文化史的縮影。

sentences.english: The Chinese translation of Buddhist scriptures is an epochal event in the history of Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 佛典漢譯是中國文化史上的一個重大事件。

sentences.english: The rapid development of science and technology reflects the status of Moism in the history of scientific culture.
sentences.chinese: 科學技術迅猛發展彰顯了墨學在科學文化史上的地位。

sentences.english: This is history great break - through and development of last time of Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 這是中國文化史上一次重大的突破與發展。

sentences.english: No, Germany's immense contribution to European cultural history is something completely different.
sentences.chinese: 不，德國對歐洲文化史的巨大貢獻是全然不同的。

sentences.english: Four great inventions in human history, science and culture left a brilliant page.
sentences.chinese: 四大發明，在人類科學文化史上留下了燦爛的一頁。

sentences.english: The Redology is one of famous social science in the Chinese cultural history of the 20th century.
sentences.chinese: “紅學”是二十世紀中國文化史中的顯學之一。

sentences.english: In the history of modern Chinese thought and culture, Feng Guifen was a feudalism capitalism transitional figure.
sentences.chinese: 在中國近代思想文化史上，馮桂芬是個過渡性的人物。

sentences.english: The culture of mirror image is a kind of characteristic content in the culture history of china.
sentences.chinese: 鏡象文化是中國文化史上一項獨具個性的內容。

sentences.english: How did domestication of large animals affect human cultural history?
sentences.chinese: 馴養大型動物對人類文化史有什麼影響？

sentences.english: This is a phenomenon exclusively occurred in the history of Han culture in China.
sentences.chinese: 這是中國的漢文化史上的獨特現象。

sentences.english: Jenner's coming-out is a big moment in US pop culture history.
sentences.chinese: 詹納的出現是美國流行文化史上的一個重要時刻。

definition: modern history (for China, from the Opium Wars until the fall of the Qing Dynasty, i.e. mid-19th to early 20th century)
